name: Combat Wings
description: Combat Wings is a flight simulator which centers around the battle of Midway. You get to play as an American pilot in a variety of missions. Choose from fighter planes, bombers or spotter planes. You can also take the role as a gunner in a bomber or an anti-aircraft gun to defend your base against Japanese planes. Play a campaign, training missions or try free flight. Multiplayer via Internet or LAN is also possible.
